title: GET_VEHICLE_HAS_KERS
content:
0x50634E348C8D44EF0x0761E635// GetVehicleHasKers
BOOL GET_VEHICLE_HAS_KERS(Vehicle vehicle);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle handle.Returns: Returns true if the vehicle has a kers boost (for instance the lectro or the vindicator)Old name:  _HAS_VEHICLE_KERS_BOOST
